m_szDocTitle: ITM Power reports growing order book  | LON:ITM
m_szDocSumamry: ITM Power reports growing order book Share A first London re-fuelling site will open in May with second schedule for July Five stations will be open in UK by end 2016 ITM Power ’s ( LON:ITM ) project pipeline has risen to £18.7mln with growing interest in its rapid response electrolysers. The hydrogen storage and fuel systems group has £9.7mln of projects contracted and a further £9mln in the final stages of negotiation. That compares with £17.7mln in total at the end of January, which itself was 55% higher than a year earlier. Enquiries are growing for larger scale platforms in the range of 0
